</body>***дачка.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:дачка.html>да́чка</a> (22085)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B4%D0%B0%D1%87%D0%BA%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>Diminutive of <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*dъ̏ťi</i> (cognate with <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Ukrainian_language" class="extiw" title="w:Ukrainian language">Ukrainian</a></span> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="uk"><a href = vnd.unilang:дочка.html>до́чка</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Uk-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">dočká</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Russian_language" class="extiw" title="w:Russian language">Russian</a></span> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дочка.html>до́чка</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">dóčka</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>), from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Proto-Balto-Slavic_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Balto-Slavic language">Proto-Balto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ine-bsl-pro">*duktē</i>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Proto-Indo-European_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Indo-European language">Proto-Indo-European</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ine-pro">*dʰugh₂tḗr</i>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B4%D0%B0%D1%87%D0%BA%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="be"><a href = vnd.unilang:дачка.html>да́чка</a></strong> • (<span lang="Be-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">dačká</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> | <abbr title="animate">anim</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="be"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B4%D0%B0%D1%87%D0%BA%D1%96amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="дачкі (page does not exist)">дачкі</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="be"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B4%D0%BE%D1%87%D0%BA%D1%96amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="дочкі (page does not exist)">дочкі</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>daughter</li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms">Related terms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B4%D0%B0%D1%87%D0%BA%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=6" title="Edit section: Related terms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="be"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%85%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B0,_%D1%82%D0%B0%D1%87%D0%BA%D0%B0,_%D0%B4%D0%B0%D1%87%D0%BA%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:хата.html>ха́та</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тачка.html>та́чка</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:дачка.html>да́чка</a> (page does not exist)"><a href = vnd.unilang:хата.html>ха́та</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тачка.html>та́чка</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:дачка.html>да́чка</a></a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Be-Latn" class="tr Latn">xata, tačka, dačka</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B4%D0%B0%D1%87%D0%BA%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:дачка.html>да́чка</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:женский.html>же́нский</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 1-е <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ние</a> | (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 3*a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка).

</p>
<h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B4%D0%B0%D1%87%D0%BA%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=5" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:дачник.html>да́чник</a> (15940)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B4%D0%B0%D1%87%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%BAamp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дача.html>да́ча</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">dáča</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ник</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-nik</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B4%D0%B0%D1%87%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%BAamp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дачник.html>да́чник</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">dáčnik</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> | <abbr title="animate">anim</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дачник.html>да́чника</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дачник.html>да́чники</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дачник.html>да́чников</a></b>, <i>feminine</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B4%D0%B0%D1%87%D0%BD%D0%B8%D1%86%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="дачница (page does not exist)">дачница</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>summer resident; owner of a dacha</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B4%D0%B0%D1%87%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%BAamp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:дача.html>да́ч</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ник</b>

</body>***дачный.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:дачный.html>да́чный</a> (8007)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B4%D0%B0%D1%87%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дача.html>да́ча</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">dáča</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ный</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-nyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective">Adjective</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B4%D0%B0%D1%87%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Adjective">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дачный.html>да́чный</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">dáčnyj</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">relational</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> dacha
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:дачный.html>да́чная</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:мебель.html>ме́бель</a></i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>dáčnaja</b> mébelʹ</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><b>dacha</b> furniture</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li>suburban <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">of means of transport; i.e. taking passengers to dachas</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:дачный.html>да́чный</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:поезд.html>поезд</a></i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>dáčnyj</b> pójezd</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><b>suburban</b> train</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li>summer <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content">time when people go to dachas</span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:дачный.html>да́чный</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:сезон.html>сезо́н</a></i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>dáčnyj</b> sezón</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><b>summer</b> season, <b>dacha</b> season</span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B4%D0%B0%D1%87%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:дача.html>да́ч</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ный</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:относительный.html>относи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка | — 1*a-.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-дач-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:порядочный.html>-н</a></b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ый</b>.
</p>
<h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B4%D0%B0%D1%87%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=5" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:относиться.html>относя́щийся</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:к.html>к</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:дача.html>да́че</a> (знач. 1 <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> 2) <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  | <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. ).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>
</ol>
<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B4%D0%B0%D1%87%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=6" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ol>

</ol>
</body>***два.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>два</a> (73)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_4">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B4%D0%B2%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=22" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*dъva</i>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Proto-Indo-European_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Indo-European language">Proto-Indo-European</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ine-pro">*dwóh₁</i>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Numeral_4">Numeral</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B4%D0%B2%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=24" title="Edit section: Numeral">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>два</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">dva</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> or <abbr title="neuter gender">n</abbr></span> (<i>feminine</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>две́</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>two (2)</li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Usage_notes_2">Usage notes</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B4%D0%B2%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=25" title="Edit section: Usage notes">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><i><b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>два</a></b></i> and <i><b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>две́</a></b></i>, when in the nominative case or accusative case, even in compounds (22, 32, 42, 102, etc.), govern the genitive of the noun.<i></i>
</p>
<dl><dd><ul><li><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>два</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:мальчик.html>ма́льчика</a></i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>dva</b> málʹčika</i> ― <span class="e-translation">two boys</span> (literally, “<span class="e-literally">two of a boy</span>”)</div></li>
<li><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>две́</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:книга.html>кни́ги</a></i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>dve</b> knígi</i> ― <span class="e-translation">two books</span> (literally, “<span class="e-literally">two of a book</span>”)</div></li>
<li><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:пятьдесят.html>пятьдеся́т</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>два</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:мальчик.html>ма́льчика</a></i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">pjatʹdesját <b>dva</b> málʹčika</i> ― <span class="e-translation">fifty-two boys</span> (literally, “<span class="e-literally">fifty-two of a boy</span>”)</div></li></ul></dd></dl>
<ul><li><i>In the nominative case, all nouns become genitive singular. In the accusative case, animate nouns become genitive plural and inanimate nouns remain in genitive singular.</i></li></ul>
<dl><dd><ul><li><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>Две́</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:собака.html>соба́ки</a>, <b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>два</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:кот.html>кота́</a>, <b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>две́</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:книга.html>кни́ги</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>два</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:журнал.html>журна́ла</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:свалиться.html>свали́лись</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:со.html>со</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:стол.html>стола́</a>.</i><dl><dd><i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>Dve</b> sobáki, <b>dva</b> kotá, <b>dve</b> knígi i <b>dva</b> žurnála svalílisʹ so stolá.</i></dd><dd><span class="e-translation">Two dogs, two cats, two books and two journals fell from the table.</span></dd></dl></div> (<i>"<a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>два</a>" transforms all nouns from nominative to genitive singular.</i>)</li>
<li><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:я.html>Я</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:видеть.html>ви́жу</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>дву́х</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:собака.html>соба́к</a>, <b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>дву́х</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:кот.html>кото́в</a>, <b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>две́</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:книга.html>кни́ги</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>два</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:журнал.html>журна́ла</a>.</i><dl><dd><i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Ja vížu <b>dvux</b> sobák, <b>dvux</b> kotóv, <b>dve</b> knígi i <b>dva</b> žurnála.</i></dd><dd><span class="e-translation">I see two dogs, two cats, two books and two journals.</span></dd></dl></div> (<i>The verb "<a href = vnd.unilang:видеть.html>ви́жу</a>" governs accusative case, and "<a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>два</a>" transforms dogs and cats from accusative to genitive plural.</i>)</li>
<li><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:я.html>Я</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:скачать.html>скача́л</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>два</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:редактор.html>редактора</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пригласить.html>пригласи́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:обед.html>обед</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>дву́х</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:редактор.html>редакторов</a>.</i><dl><dd><i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Ja skačál <b>dva</b> redaktora i priglasíl na obéd <b>dvux</b> redaktorov.</i></dd><dd><span class="e-translation">I downloaded two editors and invited two editors for lunch.</span></dd></dl></div></li>
<li><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B7%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%B5%D0%BC%D0%BB%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="заземлить (page does not exist)">Заземлив</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>два</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:проводник.html>проводника́</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:электрик.html>эле́ктрик</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:спасти.html>спас</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>дву́х</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:проводник.html>проводнико́в</a>.</i><dl><dd><i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Zazemliv <b>dva</b> provodniká, eléktrik spas <b>dvux</b> provodnikóv.</i></dd><dd><span class="e-translation">Grounding the two (electrical) conductors, the electrician saved the two (train) conductors.</span></dd></dl></div></li></ul></dd></dl>
<ul><li><i>The reason behind the <b>genitive singular</b> here is that, in Old Russian, </i><b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>два</a></b><i> governed the dual number, and the old <b>nominative dual</b> form was the same as the masculine <b>genitive singular</b>. When the dual number was lost in Russian, the form came to be considered the genitive singular that it resembled. This was extended to include the numbers </i><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:три.html>три</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">tri</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span><i> and </i><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:четыре.html>четы́ре</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">četýre</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span><i>, and eventually it was applied by analogy to feminine nouns as well.</i></li>
<li><i>While the noun in a nominative construction is in the <b>genitive singular</b> following <b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>два</a></b> or <b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>две́</a></b>, an intervening adjective or adjectival participle will be in the <b>genitive plural</b> or <b>nominative plural</b> </i>
<ul><li><i>If <a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>два</a> is in nominative case, the adjective will be nominative plural when the noun is feminine</i></li></ul></li></ul>
<dl><dd><ul><li><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:тут.html>Тут</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>две́</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:большой.html>большие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:собака.html>соба́ки</a>, <b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>два</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:большой.html>больших</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:кот.html>кота́</a>, <b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>две́</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:большой.html>большие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:книга.html>кни́ги</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>два</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:большой.html>больших</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:стол.html>стола́</a>.</i><dl><dd><i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Tut <b>dve</b> bolʹšije sobáki, <b>dva</b> bolʹšix kotá, <b>dve</b> bolʹšije knígi i <b>dva</b> bolʹšix stolá.</i></dd><dd><span class="e-translation">Here are two big dogs, two big cats, two big books and two big tables.</span></dd></dl></div></li></ul></dd></dl>
<ul><li><ul><li><i>If <a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>два</a> is in accusative case, the adjective will be the same as the nominative plural only if the noun is feminine inanimate</i></li></ul></li></ul>
<dl><dd><ul><li><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:я.html>Я</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:видеть.html>ви́жу</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>дву́х</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:большой.html>больших</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:собака.html>соба́к</a>, <b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>дву́х</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:большой.html>больших</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:кот.html>кото́в</a>, <b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>две́</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:большой.html>большие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:книга.html>кни́ги</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>два</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:большой.html>больших</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:стол.html>стола́</a>.</i><dl><dd><i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Ja vížu <b>dvux</b> bolʹšix sobák, <b>dvux</b> bolʹšix kotóv, <b>dve</b> bolʹšije knígi i <b>dva</b> bolʹšix stolá.</i></dd><dd><span class="e-translation">I see two big dogs, two big cats, two big books and two big tables.</span></dd></dl></div></li></ul></dd></dl>
<ul><li><ul><li>Another way of seeing this is:</li></ul></li></ul>
<dl><dd><ul><li>Nominative feminine is <a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>две́</a> + nominative plural adjective + genitive singular noun</li>
<li>Nominative masculine is <a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>два</a> + genitive plural adjective + genitive singular noun.</li>
<li>Cases other than nominative and accusative (genitive, dative, instrumental, and prepositional) use plural forms, and agree in number and case with the noun.</li>
<li>Accusative animate is the same as the genitive, and accusative inanimate is the same as the nominative.</li></ul></dd></dl>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:три.html>Три</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">Tri</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> and <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:четыре.html>четы́ре</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">četýre</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> obey the same rules.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms_2">Related terms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B4%D0%B2%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=29" title="Edit section: Related terms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="derivedterms" style="column-count: 3; -moz-column-count: 3; -ms-column-count: 3; -o-column-count: 3; -webkit-column-count: 3;">
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дважды.html>два́жды</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">dváždy</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">двоежёнство</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">dvoježónstvo</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">двоеточие</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">dvojetóčije</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B4%D0%B2%D0%BE%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="двоиться (page does not exist)">двоиться</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">dvoitʹsja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">двоичный</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">dvoíčnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:двойка.html>дво́йка</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">dvójka</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:двойник.html>двойни́к</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">dvojník</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:двойной.html>двойно́й</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">dvojnój</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">двойня</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">dvójnja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:двойственный.html>дво́йственный</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">dvójstvennyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:двоюродный.html>двою́родный</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">dvojúrodnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:двоякий.html>двоя́кий</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">dvojákij</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B4%D0%B2%D1%83%D0%B1%D0%BE%D1%80%D1%82%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="двубортный (page does not exist)">двубортный</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">dvubortnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span></h3>

<p><b> </b>
</p><p>Числительное, <a href = vnd.unilang:количественный.html>коли́чественное</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующее</a> порядковое числительное | — <a href = vnd.unilang:второй.html>второ́й</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:собирательный.html>собира́тельные</a> числительные | — | <a href = vnd.unilang:двое.html>дво́е</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:оба.html>о́ба</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-дв-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:понимать.html>-а</a></b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:двадцатилетний.html>двадцатиле́тний</a> (15381)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B4%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%86%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B8%D0%BB%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:двадцать.html>два́дцать</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">dvadcátʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-и-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-i-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лето.html>ле́то</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">léto</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ний</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-nij</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective">Adjective</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B4%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%86%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B8%D0%BB%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Adjective">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:двадцатилетний.html>двадцатиле́тний</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">dvadcatilétnij</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">relational</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> twenty-year
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:двадцатилетний.html>двадцатиле́тнее</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:царствование.html>ца́рствование</a></i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>dvadcatilétneje</b> cárstvovanije</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><b>twenty-year</b> reign</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li>twenty<a href="/w/index.php?title=-year-oldamp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="-year-old (page does not exist)">-year-old</a>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:двадцатилетний.html>двадцатиле́тняя</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:женщина.html>же́нщина</a></i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>dvadcatilétnjaja</b> žénščina</i> ― <span class="e-translation">a woman <b>of twenty</b>; a <b>twenty-year-old</b> woman</span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B4%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%86%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B8%D0%BB%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>два</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>дца<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ти.html>ти</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:лето.html>лет</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ний</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка | — 2*a.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-дв-</b>; интерфикс: <b>-а-</b>; суффикс: <b>-дцат</b>; интерфикс: <b>-и-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-лет-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:порядочный.html>-н</a></b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ий</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

</body>***двадцатка.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:двадцатка.html>двадца́тка</a> (26194)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B4%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%86%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%BA%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=3" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:двадцатка.html>двадца́тка</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">dvadcátka</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:двадцатка.html>двадца́тки</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:двадцатка.html>двадца́тки</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:двадцатка.html>двадца́ток</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">colloquial</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> twenty</li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">colloquial</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> twenty roubles, dollars, etc.</li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">colloquial</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> (tram, bus, etc.) number twenty</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B4%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%86%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%BA%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b>двад<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>цат<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ка</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:женский.html>же́нский</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 1-е <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ние</a> | (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 3*a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-дв-</b>; интерфикс: <b>-а-</b>; суффиксы: <b>-дцат-к</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:понимать.html>-а</a></b>.
</p>

<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:двадцатый.html>двадца́тый</a> (4040)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective">Adjective</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B4%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%86%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=3" title="Edit section: Adjective">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:двадцатый.html>двадца́тый</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">dvadcátyj</span>)
</p>
<ol><li>twentieth</li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms">Related terms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B4%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%86%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=6" title="Edit section: Related terms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:двадцатка.html>двадца́тка</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">dvadcátka</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B2-%D0%B4%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%86%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8B%D1%85amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="в-двадцатых (page does not exist)">в-двадцатых</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">v-dvadcátyx</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>два</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>дца<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>тый</b>
</p><p>Числительное, порядковое, адъективное <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ние</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка | — 1a. <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующее</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:количественный.html>коли́чественное</a> числительное | — <a href = vnd.unilang:двадцать.html>два́дцать</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-дв-</b>; интерфикс: <b>-а-</b>; суффиксы: <b>-дцат-∅</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ый</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

</body>***двадцать.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:двадцать.html>два́дцать</a> (405)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B4%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%86%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>два</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">dva</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-дцать</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-dcatʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, or "twice ten". This was an <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Old_East_Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Old East Slavic">Old East Slavic</a></span> <small>[Term?]</small> dual form.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Numeral">Numeral</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B4%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%86%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Numeral">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:двадцать.html>два́дцать</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">dvádcatʹ</span>)
</p>
<ol><li>twenty (20)</li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Usage_notes">Usage notes</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B4%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%86%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=5" title="Edit section: Usage notes">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><strong class="selflink"><a href = vnd.unilang:двадцать.html>два́дцать</a></strong></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">dvadcatʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> in the nominative case and accusative case governs the genitive plural of the noun. In other cases, it governs the corresponding plural case of the noun.
</p>
<ul><li><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:двадцать.html>два́дцать</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:мальчик.html>ма́льчиков</a></i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>dvádcatʹ</b> málʹčikov</i> ― <span class="e-translation">twenty boys</span></div></li>
<li><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:двадцать.html>двадцатью</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:мальчик.html>ма́льчиками</a></i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">s <b>dvadcatʹjú</b> málʹčikami</i> ― <span class="e-translation">with twenty boys</span></div></li>
<li><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:мальчик.html>ма́льчиков</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:двадцать.html>два́дцать</a></b></i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">málʹčikov <b>dvádcatʹ</b></i> ― <span class="e-translation">approximately twenty boys</span></div></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B4%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%86%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>два</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>дцать</b>
</p><p>Числительное, <a href = vnd.unilang:количественный.html>коли́чественное</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующее</a> порядковое числительное | — | <a href = vnd.unilang:двадцатый.html>двадца́тый</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-дв-</b>; интерфикс: <b>-а-</b>; суффикс: <b>-дцать</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B4%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%86%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=5" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B4%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%86%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=6" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:двадцать.html>двадцатью</a> (25953)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_1">Etymology 1</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B4%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%86%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%8Eamp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology 1">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Adverb">Adverb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B4%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%86%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%8Eamp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Adverb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:двадцать.html>двадцатью</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">dvádcatʹju</span>)
</p>
<ol><li>20x, 20 times as much
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:двадцать.html>двадцатью</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:пять.html>пять</a> — <a href = vnd.unilang:сто.html>сто</a></i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>dvádcatʹju</b> pjátʹ — sto</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><b>twenty times</b> five is one hundred</span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<div class="NavFrame" style="">
<div class="NavHead">Multiplicative adverbs</div>
<div class="NavContent" style="" align="left">
<ul><li>1x, 1 time as much: <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:единожды.html>еди́ножды</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">jedínoždy</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li>2x, twice as much: <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дважды.html>два́жды</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">dváždy</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li>3x, 3 times as much: <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:трижды.html>три́жды</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">tríždy</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li>4x, 4 times as much: <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:четырежды.html>четы́режды</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">četýreždy</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li>5x, 5 times as much: <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:пять.html>пятью</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">pjátʹju</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li>6x, 6 times as much: <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:шесть.html>шестью</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">šéstʹju</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li>7x, 7 times as much: <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:семья.html>семью́</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">sémʹju</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li>8x, 8 times as much: <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">восемью</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">vósemʹju</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li>9x, 9 times as much: <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:девять.html>девятью́</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">dévjatʹju</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li>10x, 10 times as much: <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:десять.html>десятью</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">désjatʹju</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li>11x, 11 times as much: <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:одиннадцать.html>оди́ннадцатью</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">odínnadcatʹju</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li>12x, 12 times as much: <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:двенадцать.html>двена́дцатью</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">dvenádcatʹju</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li>13x, 13 times as much: <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:тринадцать.html>трина́дцатью</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">trinádcatʹju</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li>14x, 14 times as much: <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:четырнадцать.html>четы́рнадцатью</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">četýrnadcatʹju</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li>15x, 15 times as much: <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:пятнадцать.html>пятна́дцатью</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">pjatnádcatʹju</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li>16x, 16 times as much: <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:шестнадцать.html>шестна́дцатью</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">šestnádcatʹju</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li>17x, 17 times as much: <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:семнадцать.html>семна́дцатью</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">semnádcatʹju</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li>18x, 18 times as much: <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:восемнадцать.html>восемна́дцатью</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">vosemnádcatʹju</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li>19x, 19 times as much: <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:девятнадцать.html>девятна́дцатью</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">devjatnádcatʹju</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>

<li>60x, 60 times as much: <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:шестьдесят.html>шестью́десятью</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">šestʹjúdesjatʹju</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>

<li>80x, 80 times as much: <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:восемьдесят.html>восемью́десятью</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">vosemʹjúdesjatʹju</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:восемьдесят.html>восьмью́десятью</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">vosʹmʹjúdesjatʹju</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>

<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Numeral">Numeral</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B4%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%86%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%8Eamp;action=editamp;section=7" title="Edit section: Numeral">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:двадцать.html>двадцатью</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">dvadcatʹjú</span>)
</p>

<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:дважды.html>два́жды</a> (2589)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B4%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%B6%D0%B4%D1%8Bamp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>два</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">dva</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-жды</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-ždy</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adverb">Adverb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B4%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%B6%D0%B4%D1%8Bamp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Adverb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дважды.html>два́жды</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">dváždy</span>)
</p>
<ol><li>twice, on two occasions
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:дважды.html>два́жды</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:жизнь.html>жи́зни</a></i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>dváždy</b> v žízni</i> ― <span class="e-translation">twice in someone's life</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li>2x, twice as much
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:дважды.html>два́жды</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:пять.html>пять</a> — <a href = vnd.unilang:десять.html>де́сять</a></i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>dváždy</b> pjatʹ — désjatʹ</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><b>two times</b> five is ten</span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>

<li>17x, 17 times as much: <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:семнадцать.html>семна́дцатью</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">semnádcatʹju</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li>18x, 18 times as much: <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:восемнадцать.html>восемна́дцатью</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">vosemnádcatʹju</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li>19x, 19 times as much: <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:девятнадцать.html>девятна́дцатью</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">devjatnádcatʹju</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li>20x, 20 times as much: <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:двадцать.html>двадцатью</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">dvádcatʹju</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li>30x, 30 times as much: <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:тридцать.html>тридцатью́</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">trídcatʹju</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li>50x, 50 times as much: <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:пятьдесят.html>пятью́десятью</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">pjatʹjúdesjatʹju</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li>60x, 60 times as much: <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:шестьдесят.html>шестью́десятью</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">šestʹjúdesjatʹju</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li>70x, 70 times as much: <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:семьдесят.html>семью́десятью</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">semʹjúdesjatʹju</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li>80x, 80 times as much: <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:восемьдесят.html>восемью́десятью</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">vosemʹjúdesjatʹju</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:восемьдесят.html>восьмью́десятью</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">vosʹmʹjúdesjatʹju</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
</div></div>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B4%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%B6%D0%B4%D1%8Bamp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b>дваж<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ды</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:наречие.html>Наре́чие</a>; неизменяемое.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-дв-</b>; суффиксы: <b>-а-жды</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

</body>***двенадцатый.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:двенадцатый.html>двена́дцатый</a> (6224)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective">Adjective</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B4%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%86%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=3" title="Edit section: Adjective">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:двенадцатый.html>двена́дцатый</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">dvenádcatyj</span>)
</p>
<ol><li>twelfth</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B4%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%86%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>две́</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>дца<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>тый</b>
</p><p>Порядковое числительное (<a href = vnd.unilang:счетный.html>счётное</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>прилага́тельное</a>), <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка | — 1a.
<a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующее</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:количественный.html>коли́чественное</a> числительное | — <a href = vnd.unilang:двенадцать.html>двена́дцать</a>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-дв-</b>; интерфикс: <b>-е-</b>; суффиксы: <b>-надцат-∅</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ый</b>.
</p>
<h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B4%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%86%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=5" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:иметь.html>име́ющий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:номер.html>но́мер</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:двенадцать.html>двена́дцать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ряд.html>ряду</a> однородных <a href = vnd.unilang:объект.html>объе́ктов</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:после.html>после</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:одиннадцатый.html>оди́ннадцатого</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:перед.html>пе́ред</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:тринадцатый.html>трина́дцатым</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  | <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. ).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>
<li> 2012 (1912, 1812, 1712, <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> т.п) <a href = vnd.unilang:год.html>год</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  | <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>В</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:двенадцатый.html>двена́дцатом</a></span> <a href = vnd.unilang:я.html>я</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:уже.html>уже́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:командовать.html>кома́ндовал</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:полок.html>полко́м</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>

</body>***двенадцать.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:двенадцать.html>двена́дцать</a> (1852)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B4%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%86%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>Compounded from <b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>две́</a></b> + <b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b> + <b>дцать</b>, or <i>two on ten</i>. The feminine <b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>две́</a></b> is used here because the final syllable <b>дцать</b>, an old short form of <b><a href = vnd.unilang:десять.html>де́сять</a></b>, is a feminine substantive.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Numeral">Numeral</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B4%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%86%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Numeral">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:двенадцать.html>двена́дцать</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">dvenádcatʹ</span>)
</p>
<ol><li>twelve (12)</li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Usage_notes">Usage notes</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B4%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%86%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=5" title="Edit section: Usage notes">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><strong class="selflink"><a href = vnd.unilang:двенадцать.html>двена́дцать</a></strong></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">dvenadcatʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> in the nominative case and accusative case governs the genitive plural of the noun. In other cases, it governs the corresponding plural case of the noun.
</p>
<ul><li><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:двенадцать.html>двена́дцать</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:мальчик.html>ма́льчиков</a></i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>dvenádcatʹ</b> málʹčikov</i> ― <span class="e-translation">twelve boys</span></div></li>
<li><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:двенадцать.html>двена́дцатью</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:мальчик.html>ма́льчиками</a></i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">s <b>dvenádcatʹju</b> málʹčikami</i> ― <span class="e-translation">with twelve boys</span></div></li>
<li><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:мальчик.html>ма́льчиков</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:двенадцать.html>двена́дцать</a></b></i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">málʹčikov <b>dvenádcatʹ</b></i> ― <span class="e-translation">approximately twelve boys</span></div></li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Synonyms">Synonyms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B4%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%86%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=7" title="Edit section: Synonyms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">дванадесять</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">dvanádesjatʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">archaic</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дюжина.html>дю́жина</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">djúžina</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms">Related terms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B4%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B4%D1%86%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=8" title="Edit section: Related terms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>две́</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:над.html>над</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>цать</b>
</p><p>Числительное, <a href = vnd.unilang:количественный.html>коли́чественное</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующее</a> порядковое числительное | — | <a href = vnd.unilang:двенадцатый.html>двена́дцатый</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-дв-</b>; интерфикс: <b>-е-</b>; суффикс: <b>-надцать</b>.
</p>
